workflow_recommendation.step1: First generate Mai_Neutral as the default reference image and save to 02_Characters/images/Mai/Mai_Default.png
workflow_recommendation.step2: Upload Mai_Default.png to NanoBananaPro as reference (Face ID / Character Ref enabled)
workflow_recommendation.step3: Set reference_strength to ~0.88 to lock identity (short dark brown hair with black roots, sharp determined eyes, serious expression, athletic face structure)
workflow_recommendation.step4: Generate each expression with corresponding positive_prompt and negative_prompt; use 1:1 crop focusing on face
workflow_recommendation.step5: Adjust denoising_strength per expression: subtle changes (0.30-0.44), moderate (0.48-0.52), dramatic shifts like dance passion (0.55)
workflow_recommendation.step6: Save outputs with suggested filenames: Mai_Neutral.png, Mai_Focused.png, Mai_Confident.png, Mai_Gentle_Smile.png, Mai_Frustrated.png, Mai_Vulnerable.png, Mai_Determined.png, Mai_Dance_Passion.png
workflow_recommendation.note: Mai maintains professional composure as a leader but shows natural warmth to trusted people. 'Gentle_Smile' is her natural expression with those she trusts. 'Vulnerable' and 'Dance_Passion' show deeper emotional shifts. Unlike Ai (who cannot express emotion), Mai chooses when to show warmth.
